title: Fara F-RD aero road bike adapts integrated all-road bikepacking tech to smooth roads
content:
Norwegian Fara Cycling adds a new F/RD aero road bike to their adventure-ready bike line-up, mixing all-day geometry and a hint of the integrated features of the fast gravel bikepacking-ready F/AR all-road bike. Developed for road cyclists looking to ride further, the aero endurance F/RD still leans towards all-road, but does it faster & lighter

The post Fara F-RD aero road bike adapts integrated all-road bikepacking tech to smooth roads appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
